SocialMedia_Logic

Interface SocialMediaLogic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocialMediaLogicImpl

    public interface SocialMediaLogic
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface class for the SocialMediaLogic which handles all actions
    Author:
    Max
